text: Lord Buddha Koshi Medical College and Hospital is a medical college and hospital located in Saharsa, Bihar, India. This college got approval from MCI in 2019 from 100 MBBS Seat.College is located in between Saharsa Madhepra National Highway 107. ==External links== *Official website Category:Medical colleges in Bihar Category:Saharsa
title: Lord Buddha Koshi Medical College and Hospital
